website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a base coat to apply before you top it off with other nail polishes, the Anchor base coat is a good choice.
pros: Clear color that goes on easily and dries quickly
Creates the perfect base coat for your favorite nail colors
Holds nail polish in place for long wear
Add a second coat, and you can wear it alone
cons: A few users complained that it dried out their nails

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the top and base coats
customer_reviews.text: I brought the anchor base coat and the armor top coat because this nail polish is expensive. I wanted to use the colors I already had. These products are the truth. I applied a thin base coat and after the polish I applied 2 top coats( 15 minutes apart so that the polish could dry). My photos were taken 5 days after my manicure and I think they look pretty great. There is a little wear and tear but not like other polishes I have used. There are no significant chips. For this to happen with regular polish , not gel or SND or shellac is amazing. I prefer regular polish to the others. Soya has a life long customer.
customer_reviews.author: Chalikechampagne

customer_reviews.title: Her nails still look great, and I'm happy that she is doing another ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife at her request. She is trying to steer our family away from harmful chemicals one product/life style change at a time. Her nails still look great, and I'm happy that she is doing another thing to help prevent cancer and other horrible diseases. It is an easy thing to do- switch from one brand to another & still be satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kent Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Longer lasting healthier manicures
customer_reviews.text: This photo is after 3 days of wear. You can see the edges of my natural nail beginning to wear through but that's it. I use Zoya NM Glossy Seal top coat. Zoya products are always reliable, and this base coat is no different. Properly clean nails + this base coat make a huge difference in manicure duration, I am having manis last over 5 days. My nails are protected during wear and now are healthier after removal. I can also be confident in the product knowing that it's 5 free.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sweaters

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Really makes a difference in how long polish lasts. I work in an industrial environment, not manicure friendly & made it an entire 48 hour week without chipping or peeling!
customer_reviews.author: S. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Base is essential. ZOYA is imperative
customer_reviews.text: The purpose of a base coat is to protect your nails from the nail polish you apply next. That being said ZOYA is a brand that does not contain nasty chemicals that can and will cross the nail into your body which is why I use it. Take the plunge and at least buy a decent base coat like ZOYA.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and dries super fast. I use it with the top coat and the fast dry drops and it keeps my nail polish perfect for at least a week. I change my nail color once or twice a week. No chips or peeling off. Will buy again but I wish it came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: I have one complaint
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on my nails so smooth. It dries so quick. Makes my nails look very good. Saying that I only have one problem with it. It did not protect my nails from a dark nail polish like I expected it to do. So the next time because I will continue to use this product I will put three coats on my nails before I put the red nail polish I will put on for this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: BullDog

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I don't like leaving bad reviews but this base coat bubbles, which makes the whole process a giant waste of time. Just spent hours (put my base coat on yesterday) doing my nails and with each coat I was hoping it would smooth out but now I have to take it all off and start over tomorrow. I did some research today and found I'm not the only one that's had this problem. Google "Zoya bubbles". Wish I had done that before I spent the $10.00. Going back to Seche base coat at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: JodyYo

customer_reviews.title: This Zoya product is not the same as Zoya website purchased anchor basecoat
customer_reviews.text: I find it hard to believe that this is actually an authentic bottle of Zoya anchor base coat. My manicure only lasted a couple days before it’s literally peeling off. I won’t be buying any cosmetics from Amazon in the future because of the problem with authenticity. There is a definite difference between this product and the ones I have purchased directly from Zoya’s website. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Designer At Heart

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a "sticky" base coat but this is a game changer. I use this on my nails all the time and they last so much longer! A dream come true, especially in my line of work.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing polishes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing polishes I've ever worn!! Pair this with the zoya top coat and my nails stay painted longer than they ever have with other polishes. I'm absolutely amazed, I'll never use another base and top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is a great alternative to conventional nail polish products
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is a great alternative to conventional nail polish products. I even take it to the salon with me when getting manicures so I know I'm using safer products on my nails.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! My nails were damaged from other polish. I gave my nails over a month with no polish and treated them every night with coconut oil or Vaseline. Then started strictly using Zoya. Just removed my polish to change colors and my nails look so beautiful with just the base coat on! They are so much healthier now using this and zoya polishes.
customer_reviews.author: Turtletz

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not a good base coat, it lets the nail polish bleed through and stain your nails.
customer_reviews.author: Pp vice

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell, Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, meaning it doesn't smell toxic after leaving it on and it seems to me to be long lasting. Every color I apply on top of it seems to last more than 7 days without chipping or cracking, as compared to other bases. Alone, it gives a nice shine to the nails.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan A. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great base
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but great base coat. I work in medical field. When my hands aren’t sweating in gloves I’m washing them. My nails are thin but not super short and very curved. This base coat gives me a three day wear with cheap color and cheap top coat.
customer_reviews.author: scottd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This fingernail system stays on longer then any I have use, about 2-3 days before my first chip, day 5 I remove the polish. I an mor a girly girl so 5 days outs great....t's a good polish
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love Zoya nail products! I began using them after my cancer diagnosis. Beautiful colors and hard wearing. Especially love the nail polish remover, it smells lovely. For best results, use all Zoya products together. Your manicure will last longer. 😁❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep polish on, even works with other nail polish brands.
customer_reviews.author: Luther-sMom

customer_reviews.title: Best base coat for a 2-week manicure!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best base coat on the market! Dries almost immediately. I’ve been using it for years and it can literally make my manicure last up to 2 weeks!!! It’s also fantastic for a pedicure base! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Link

customer_reviews.title: Love Zoya’s products
customer_reviews.text: This a very god base coat. Dries quickly and smoothes out you nails.
customer_reviews.author: Isidora

customer_reviews.title: The best base coat ever!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bring Anchor base coat and Seche Vite dry fast top coat to the nail salon any time I get a mani/pedi. They make the polish last WAY longer, particularly with the pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great Base Coat
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this base coat for over a year at the recommendation of a local beauty supply store. The base is very durable and helps protect the nail for cracking a chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Martha N. Walsworth

customer_reviews.title: so good. My polish has lasted greater than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My polish has lasted greater than 2 weeks.....I'm impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: The best nail products I have ever used. I recommend using anchor, nail polish and armor for lasting results.
customer_reviews.author: reader54

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stays on, protects nail & comes off with ease...all without nasty chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great nail polish
customer_reviews.text: It dries fast but not too fast that it won't let you finish painting your nail. It protects my nail and my manicure last much longer when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Can Repair Dry Nails with Regular Use
customer_reviews.text: Best base coat on the market. If you have dry nails or ones that dry out with regular polish, this is for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: no problems with this base coat.
customer_reviews.text: seems to be healthier than others. I'm satisfied and i never have any irritation from this product
customer_reviews.author: pamela harris

customer_reviews.title: Nails started splitting after using this!
customer_reviews.text: not happy will not buy this brand. My nails look bad ! Splitting and weak!
customer_reviews.author: ElkaB

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Polish !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Zoya!!! Best nail polish!!! It helps make my nails stronger and healthier!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Lacking longevity
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that this product lacks durability and longevity. No sooner applied than chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sugie

customer_reviews.title: Why kill yourself with toxic polish?
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this brand believing that this won't work as well as the toxic popular brands. I was wrong! This works as well as other popular brands without all the toxic chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, it's nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Same as any drug or discount store product, so I paid too much for this.
customer_reviews.author: VIP Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Less toxic polish, Love it and been using for over a decade!
customer_reviews.author: KSMILES

customer_reviews.title: Made my manicure last longer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a manicure that would help me get at least 5 days before my manicure chipped this product did just that. I do wash dishes and do laundry and whatnot so i know that can wear on your manicure but even with all that my manicure lasted. The only thing is I wish there was a bigger product for the price but I'm happy. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: 011grad

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My 2nd bottle
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Zoya nail polish and this is a great base coat. Lasts a long time, quick dry..
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for 24 hours but I love it. It feels amazing and I like how smooth it goes on. And a BIG plus is the 10 free chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Aparton73

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: My fav brand of nail polish.. i have so many nail polishes from em is crazy but love the formula and the staying power and the fact they don't stain my nails n destroy em.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Works well. It chips slower than my old top ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It chips slower than my old top coat, so I don't need to touch up for 2-3 days now instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: Lilo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well with other zoya products; improves the finished look
customer_reviews.author: Colette R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I love the Zoya Polish but this seemed to dry my nails and didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: JudyPete

customer_reviews.title: Best base coat.
customer_reviews.text: The only base coat I'll use & worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Extended the nail polish by about one day. Not really worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this base coat to go with Zoya polish I had also ordered through Amazon. I really don't know how well this product works because the Zoya nail polish did not last longer than any other polish I have used in the past. The reviews claimed that Zoya products were superior to other polishes but I did not find that to be.
customer_reviews.author: Sambolee

customer_reviews.title: It's great as a base coat and good as a top ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for years. It's great as a base coat and good as a top coat in a pinch as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chips easily even with correct manicure preparation and paring with other zoya products
customer_reviews.author: kathe cohagen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I think using this product along with the Armour Top Coat has really kept my nails pretty longer.
customer_reviews.author: haywhitmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This really makes. Difference in how long your polish lasts, worth the money! Now will be permanently switching from OPI to Zoya.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Butterhof

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for a client. She loves this ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a client. She loves this stuff. Shipped faster than expected. I will order again when she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Culver

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I was not very impressed with Zoya's basecoat. It wasn't terrible, but I didn't notice a difference in using it. The brush is small and doesn't fan out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: overall just ok, bought because of purchasing Zoya nail color, thought it would extend the wear but really did not do any better than any other brand of base coat I own.
customer_reviews.author: sugarbear

customer_reviews.title: Great base coat
customer_reviews.text: Great base coat. Thinner formula than the seche base coat and applies smoothly, no streaking. Will definitely repuchase. Great, healthier nail product find.
customer_reviews.author: Girlgatsby

customer_reviews.title: Healthier product for nails - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - not full of icy chemicals as most major brands are
customer_reviews.author: Emmamom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zoya is a great product from there Top coat to there Base coat and LOVE there nail polishes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product has less chemicals and is better for you
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it does not have the bad chemicals in it
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M Cole

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: No harsh chemicals. Great base for polish or even alone. Pricy but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BehindtheSeams

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using both Anchor and Armor for years and I absolutely love this stuff. I also love the Zoya polish - great colors and long-wear without chipping. The price is right - try it and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great basecoat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect base love this brand of nail color. It is not tested on animals and that is a big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: lgpyryt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't stay on long, to keep it for a day your are a prisoner to your nails.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy  a hodges

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. I will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst system ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst system ever. I followed all the steps that they recommended and at the second day it was peeling off
customer_reviews.author: Ailin Leon

customer_reviews.title: ... excited to try this base coat but was so disappointed when it peeled off the same day
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this base coat but was so disappointed when it peeled off the same day.I removed the natural greases from my nails with a little bit of acetone and also used a good brand of nail polish to paint over the base coat but it still peeled off(I tried this base coat twice on my nails and on a friend). Really disappointed with this product I don't know if I got a bad bottle or something like that, but I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: June Mahan

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is new for me. I have been trying to switch all products to Zoya due to the formadahyde free formulas. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Murray

customer_reviews.title: Product doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: all of my nails chipped 2 days later. I expected my manicure to last a week based on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Blotnick

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Zoya nail polish
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Zoya nail polish. Between the manicures and pedicures I've had AND the drugstore polishes I've purchased, ZOYA lasts the longest and looks the best. This is a great basecoat and helps make manicures last. Highly recommend to my health coaching clients. For more info, visit www.behealthyhappywhole.com.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Petrilli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product line is not only healthier for you, it out lasts any brand that I have ever purchased, regardless of price or promises. Buy with comfort. This stuff is top quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best base coat EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my toes about a month ago. It has lasted that long! No other base coat or polish has ever lasted that long! I'm now trying it on my nails. Base coat always comes off my nails (hands) after 1 day. It's now been on 5 days and no chipping. Incredible! A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Brabant

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I use all zoya products now. They are the best line of nail products on the market as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: JayefromJersey

product_meta.title: Zoya Anchor Base Coat, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description:
Zoya makes the world's longest wearing natural nail polish and nail care treaents.

BRAND STORY
Founded in 1986, Zoya focuses on high quality products for professional salons and spas. Zoya Nail Polish was the first to create a Big 3 free formula, placing an emphasis on the health and well-being of their clients.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
